entry.summary: In this post, we focus on the convergence properties of the one-point compactification of the Cantor tree space. In particular, we show that it is a Frechet space. We also show discuss other convergen...
entry.content: In this post, we focus on the convergence properties of the one-point compactification of the Cantor tree space. In particular, we show that it is a Frechet space. We also show discuss other convergence properties higher than the Frechet property. ‚Ä¶ Continue reading ‚Üí
